name: The Myles-Turing Tests
description:
A 30 seconds puzzle game. Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to jump
  • E / LMB / RMB to interact
  • O to restart
  • K to quit

NOTE: Sound needed to solve one of the tests / puzzles!

Features
  • 🧩 Solve the Myles-Turing Tests
  • 🔝 Enjoy the sci-fi intermission (elevator) music
  • 🏃‍♂️ Escape the elevator in time
  • ➕ Some randomization in the tests
  • 🥚 Easter-eggs
Known Issues
  • If solving the tests too fast, sometimes the tests will still play (over the next ones), although it won't break the current game state.
  • Inspired by CAPTCHA-like tests
  • Originally planned for 6 tests, only half made it in the end.
Done with assets from
  • https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/spaceship-interior-enviro... 
  • https://freesound.org/
  •  Upbeat Elevator Music - Ryan Hoggard

Made for Mini Jam 122 in 2d.
